entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
